train_RMSE_list=[]
test_RMSE_list=[]
for n in range(1,10):
    polynomial_convertor=PolynomialFeatures(degree=n,include_bias=False)
    poly_features=polynomial_convertor.fit_transform(X)
    X_train,X_test,y_train,y_test=train_test_split(poly_features,y,test_size=0.2,random_state=42)
    p_model=LinearRegression()
    p_model.fit(X_train,y_train)
    y_train_predict=p_model.predict(X_train)
    y_test_predict=p_model.predict(X_test)
    train_RMSE=np.sqrt(metrics.mean_squared_error(y_train,y_train_predict))
    test_RMSE=np.sqrt(metrics.mean_squared_error(y_test,y_test_predict))
    train_RMSE_list.append(train_RMSE)
    test_RMSE_list.append(test_RMSE)
